website_summaries.verdict: A plug-in, light-up globe that doubles as a constellation map.
pros: For something beyond a normal globe, this 9" globe is a good choice with its illuminated constellation map
We think it makes a perfect night light that isn't too bright
cons: Some customers reported defective light bulbs

customer_reviews.title: The globe is a nice size 9 inches diameter or so
customer_reviews.text: This globe arrived quickly and very well packaged for ultimate protection. The globe is a nice size 9 inches diameter or so. The words are clear and easy to read and include the states and capitals. The colors of the globe are bright and vibrant, the stand is a shiny silver chrome. There is a nice longish cord with an easy to turn on button to show the constellations at night. This globe is nicer than i expected...so much so that i ordered a second one. I am very pleased with the globes. sincerely, L R V.
customer_reviews.author: Rainy

customer_reviews.title: everything works fine
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this globe for my son 5 yo, who began to be very interested in different countries, distances and time of the day in them. I was looking for such a globe, according to which the child will easily understand the information. The size and graphic style was important in this case. And this globe fits to my requirements. A wonderful addition is the night mode (works from the socket), when you turn on the backlight. I had no problems with packaging or quality of the product, everything works fine. My son was delighted when he saw his gift and with pleasure began to study our planet. So seems I made a right choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super educatonal product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. My wife babysits for three children and they are just fascinated as she shows them where things are in the world. If the news happens to be on the TV and another country is named they want her to show them where it is. Any excellent product to fill some of the gaps in kid's education. By the way, they are 3 and 4 years old so they are getting an early start. A little early for the constellations yet.
customer_reviews.author: Les Hintz

customer_reviews.title: Great globe
customer_reviews.text: The globe is not only beautiful but it is built well. The base is study enough to allow for turning the globe without it sliding across the table or tipping over. The light shows during the day and is a perfect soft glow at night. The cord has a switch to easily shut off the light when needed. I couldn't be more pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W.

customer_reviews.title: Well-made and vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: We got this globe for my son's room. It is the perfect addition to his "map-themed" room. The globe is lightweight, spins easily, and is well-made. The colors are vibrant and the locations are well labeled. The light-up, constellation feature is an added bonus. We simply cannot find anything negative to say about this globe.
customer_reviews.author: jatesu

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this.  It’s a dud product
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of months, the light stopped working, so we are now unable to see the constellations. The main reason I purchased this globe instead of others was because of the light up constellations. I emailed customer services in China multiple times and received no response. Amazon refused to assist with this due to the expired return date. This was a waste of money for a worthless piece of junk. Don’t waste your time or money on this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: VIRGO78

customer_reviews.title: Great product... best option for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Perfect size for our son's bedroom (about the size of a volleyball). Very detailed geographic maps of the world, and very interesting map of star constellations when it's turned on to glow. Makes a great night light too! Our son loves it (5 y/o).
customer_reviews.author: raven13mb

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool for kids and adults alike
customer_reviews.text: My son that has autism loves studying maps so I got him this AR Globe for Christmas. As you can tell from the video, he fully immersed himself with it, starting with the animals. I've explored a few of the other modules myself from my Android phone and it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Stevens

customer_reviews.title: I received my Luminous Constellation Globe and totally love this item
customer_reviews.text: I received my Luminous Constellation Globe and totally love this item. I love the led constellations and also the enclosed pamphlet that describes all of them. I ordered this for my grandbabies so we could look at all the countries on the globe and pray for the different areas all over the world. Thank you for this amazing globe. I absolutely am thrilled with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gina R Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: price and size
customer_reviews.text: What a terrific addition to our stash of learning is fun collection. My five year old grandson loved it from the moment we took it out of the box as we explored where we live and found countries that sounded familiar to him. Even better was when we flipped the switch and looked at the celestial diagrams. I got a fantastic mini lesson from my favorite little kid on the sun that while not all together accurate was charming and a great base for further learning. This is still new to us but if first impressions count for anything I can heartily endorse getting one for the young person in your life. It is a perfect size too!
customer_reviews.author: lowellian

customer_reviews.title: While it doesn’t spin as freely as we might like, everything else about this globe is near-perfect—the scale ...
customer_reviews.text: While it doesn’t spin as freely as we might like, everything else about this globe is near-perfect—the scale s ideal for our five-year-old nephew, nd the constellation feature is even more dramatic than advertised—an excellent deal.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most unique Globe I've ever seen and great price!! Well worth it, you won't be disappointed, great quality!!
customer_reviews.author: desiree antas

customer_reviews.title: Mine doesn't work.........2nd one works and is great! Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to see the constellations at night, but nothing happened. Plugged it in, turned it on....but nada....nothing.🙁 I just now tried it one more time just to make sure. Nope....it doesn't work. Too bad...so sad. A few days later......Well, thanks to great customer service, I am now giving 5 stars. They sent another globe that works beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Gramby  Young At Heart!

customer_reviews.title: Great night lite
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic as a night light. The constellations makes a beautiful glow.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Bird

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this globe
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this globe. Not only does it show the world (politically and geographically) it shows the nighttime constellations! I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: W. B. Betts

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! I love that this globe is not too big, that the material of the globe is durable for hands to touch and spin as much as their curiosity ask for. When the lights were off and we turned on the globe we got a WOW from the room! We just love it and think it will serve not only as a great educational tool, but a cool night light for our boys room! Thumbs up here!
customer_reviews.author: I. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great teaching tool for kids of all ages
customer_reviews.text: This globe is perfect for what we wanted. We travel, and we have family who live and travek all over the globe. Now I can show my 4 year old and give him a perspective of the Earth. He's already asking questions like "why don't people fall off the bottom." Really getting his science mind working. Worth the $30. And we haven't even started with the constellations yet, so room to grow!
customer_reviews.author: Eric T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this he won’t stop talking about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimi4289

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. He likes looking at the constellations and learning about the earth.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Blevins

customer_reviews.title: We bought this globe for our kids and they love it! It is the perfect size to have ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this globe for our kids and they love it! It is the perfect size to have on the corner of a desk and the writing is clear and very legible. At night they love to see the constellations - without this feature I am not sure if they would have learned this information.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light no longer works
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this in march 2018 and have been using as a nightlight in my sons room. Out of the blue it stopped working. Its an led so should last much longer. Above description states a 2 year warranty, how can I get a replacement? Thank you! This is my 2nd attempt to reach the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. VandenBrink

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful as well as educational!
customer_reviews.text: This Globe exceeded my expectations! I bought it as an end of the school year present for my two young grandsons. The adults in my house are crazy about it, I can imagine how the boys will react when they see it. The colors are nice and bright, the night time constellations are clear and well lit up. Also, I received it quicker than I expected and it was well packaged. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: KVelez

customer_reviews.title: This was a nice globe. I purchased it for the use in ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice globe. I purchased it for the use in an Earth Science class to teach consellarions and rotation of the earth. A decent light up of constellations in a semi dark dark room.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic globe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter on her 11th birthday. She loves it! She spent the afternoon looking up countries and states on her new globe. She was delighted with the constellations that evening when we plugged it in and turned them on. What a great gift! She will use it for years.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Geography + Astronomy in one cool package. A win-win!
customer_reviews.text: The illuminated star chart is cooler than I thought. It was such a big hit with my 9-year old, and will give me the opportunity to expand his knowledge of geography in a fun and exciting way, while also encouraging astronomy. A win-win! His 3-year old cousin is jealous, so now I need to let his mom know where to buy one for him.
customer_reviews.author: avastye

customer_reviews.title: Engaging and educational for kids and adults ;)
customer_reviews.text: This globe is so much fun for my kids, and I love it because they are learning tons! I'm pretty anti screen time for my 4 and 6 year old, but I made an exception for this AR globe. Totally worth it. It entertains them for hours. They understand so much more about the world and solar system because of this globe. I am going to buy another one to put in my middle school library as an "exhibit." I only wish it worked with my kindle fire.
customer_reviews.author: chesley

customer_reviews.title: Worked out better as a gift than I ever expected to and the AR looks pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my girlfriend's son who became obsessed with geography. I never should have taught him that Animaniacs song. I got this for him for Christmas and it was his favorite gift for the year. It's not very deep in terms of educational value. But it was fun to look at and that's really what's appropriate for most kids.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: - Shipped in sturdy packaging, ensuring no damage
customer_reviews.text: - Shipped in sturdy packaging, ensuring no damage. - Great starter globe for beginners with appropriate geography labeling - The lit up constellations at night make it an amazing buy Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Babao

customer_reviews.title: Vivreal Office Globe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice globe. Good size, nice illumination for the constellations. Very happy with this purchase and am happy to recommend it too others.
customer_reviews.author: Allison A. Cowgill

customer_reviews.title: Cool and Educational
customer_reviews.text: What a cool globe! It’s big enough to see everything, but not so huge it won’t fit in your house. I love the lighted constellation feature. I do wish the base was a bit heavier (but that would increase shipping) and that it turned easier (that may come with use). All in all, this is a cool looking, educational, product.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Marie

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a bit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, but once you've gone through the information, it gets old. I wish the app updated and gave even more information that what is available. However, the lighting inside glows nice and makes for nice dresser piece.
customer_reviews.author: DC Martens

customer_reviews.title: Best Globe Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just turned 4. She is very interested in the stars and planets, especially Earth. She has wanted a globe for a long time. This one is perfect because it incorporates her interest in the planets/stars with her interest in the world around her. The globe itself is great but the bonus of having it light up with the constellations is extraordinary. She loves it! So do I!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Trash. Don't buy. App doesnt work. Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Basically I bought a night light. My daughter is 8 years old and is more knowledgeable about animals, space and geography than any adult I know-this is her "thing" so this should have been a home run right? Wrong. The app didn't work and I tried it on multiple devices so she was very let down on her 8th birthday when she couldn't get it to work. Thankfully she has a sunny disposition and appreciated a light up globe. And since it was a birthday present I didn't want to take it from her to return it. Should have went to Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: David McClure

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: we just received our globe today and we love it. The light works perfectly and the globe spins easily. my 5 and 3 year old are already enjoying finding places we have talked about on the globe and they are excited to find constellations and look up the stories that go along with each one they find. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona  Howard

customer_reviews.title: Really cool gift
customer_reviews.text: We got this gift for our 3 yo daughter and she loves it. Having a globe by itself is super cool, but the AR feature adds a whole new level of interest. The only hiccups are sometimes the floating AR buttons don't line up well on the globe, and some of the spelling/grammar has been off, but all still understandable and educational and overall this a great gift and great deal. We recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6 Year Old Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves this globe! It is lightweight but not flimsy and the constellations are really neat. This is a great gift for children young and old.
customer_reviews.author: S. E.

customer_reviews.title: Globe was beautiful but the light was flickering
customer_reviews.text: Broken. Globe was beautiful but the light was flickering. Upon opening the globe to check out the light bulb I found that it was wrapped in tape and that the base the light bulb was attached to was cracked and broken. This could have been a fire hazard. We do plan to order another one and are hoping that the second one is in better condition.
customer_reviews.author: The Ways Of Her Household

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool to learn!
customer_reviews.text: I just received it today and I loved it, the photos do not do justice because I took them quickly so that my son did not see it because it is a Christmas gift. I loved its design, color, the light works perfectly. I know it will be his favorite gift and that he will continue to learn because it is an excellent tool because it not only shows countries but also the solar system, constellations and much more, I am very excited about this gift for my son. I recommend it 100 percent.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri sanchez

customer_reviews.title: This is my world !
customer_reviews.text: TheGlobe is excellent in its clarity and accurate details. The night sky is a sensation with my children.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Appeared used and missing cord/instructions
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this globe, but it arrived loose in the box, appearing used, and missing the cord and instruction manual. So, I don’t even know if it works (and can’t even try it out). The base had a hole in the bottom and looked dirty (as if someone had it on their dresser for a while and then decided to return it). I’ve requested a replacement and am hoping to have better luck. Fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime17

customer_reviews.title: Excellent world globe.
customer_reviews.text: It's very pretty, but the light does not work. I don't know if we can fix it yet. [Update, I contacted customer service and they sent me a replacement. Best customer service ever! ] And my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Princess Leia (Nyli)

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for our granddaughter. Only negative is electric cord very short
customer_reviews.author: Dan Bagy

customer_reviews.title: Love this World Globe
customer_reviews.text: Love this World Globe. I ordered it for my grandson, for his birthday next week. He recently got a telescope and we plan to try to identify the constellations in our area, and having this will help him greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Renovation Mama

customer_reviews.title: Good basic globe, but perhaps smaller than it seems
customer_reviews.text: On time and as promised - happy with purchase and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: MCS1968

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for kids
customer_reviews.text: Globe is great for our grandkids. Their dad travels and we can follow wherever he goes! The light for viewing stars and constellations is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: GrammaKGW

customer_reviews.title: Didn't light up.
customer_reviews.text: The first word in the name of this globe is "illuminated", and that it was not! I have no idea whether it was a faulty bulb or something more than that because I emailed the company to see if there's something I could do get the light on and never got a response. Based on other reviews here, seems like a fair amount of people are receiving this product non-functional.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Awesome globe! Really cool as a night light. My son who just turned 4 is fascinated by it.
customer_reviews.author: Mina Timmons

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great price, awesome globe.
customer_reviews.text: This globe is awesome! There are others for the same price and size, but they don't have the illuminating constellation feature. It's also pretty good quality as well. My kids love it, but I may love it more! You can't beat a globe this cool for a price this good!
customer_reviews.author: Allendra Bourget

customer_reviews.title: Speech is rough.
customer_reviews.text: Cool and fun to use. The grammar and speaking portion is pretty rough. For an educational tool it's sub par.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sully

customer_reviews.title: Great globe for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one for my other son for Christmas as a gift since the other one I purchased was no longer on sale when I went back to it. Still great quality and has similar features.
customer_reviews.author: Brotha Dave

customer_reviews.title: light stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. I bought this for my son and the light stopped working after just a couple of weeks. I opened it up to try to change the bulb and was rewarded with an electric shock.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Lester

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working with less than a month
customer_reviews.text: After using for a month or so, the light won't turn on. With the light not turning on the globe is an ordinary one and the Augmented Reality and smart app it offers does not work anymore. I do not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Abhaya P.

customer_reviews.title: No constellations
customer_reviews.text: Constellations never showed up. Returning it in hopes of getting what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS P.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered and arrived really fast!! My son ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and arrived really fast!! My son of 6 years old LOVES it. Even if he wakes up in the middle of the night, the light with the constellations reassure him and he will get back to sleep! Higly reccomended!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this unique and special globe which is a very educational tool for all my family! Speedy delivery, and have no complaints about this great product!
customer_reviews.author: E.P.

customer_reviews.title: Blew a fuse in the house
customer_reviews.text: Does anyone do quality control anymore..?Didn't work when I plugged it in and flicked switch. Turned it over delicately to look for possibly a light button or whatever since it didn't work , flicked the switch again and poof, it lit up for one second and blew out a fuse for the whole living room.
customer_reviews.author: kenmac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS WORLD GLOBE....GRANDKIDS LOVE IT AND AT NIGHT IS LIGHTS AND SHOWS CONSTELLATIONS!! VERY NICE...
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Ok decent buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s good but not all key places are marked out and the AR is not all that exciting it’s ok
customer_reviews.author: Ramya

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: The whole point of this globe is that you can use the AR experience. The globe was really pretty, but the app would not do a single thing. I could not justify keeping this $40 globe just for looks, so it has been returned.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! My kids ages 6 and 8 absolutely love this globe. The colors are beautiful with easy to read text. The constellations light up perfectly! We purchased this as a learning tool, but are also using it as a night light because we enjoy it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jami Kreifels

customer_reviews.title: Great augmented reality concept!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful idea and I think my six year old and possibly even my precocious 18-month old will enjoy it, but Q-R readers are a bit behind the times and reading the QR code and setting up on a Fire tablet designed for kiddos is an involved task.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this globe for my 7-year-old, who recently has become more interested in how earth looks like and the stars above. This product satisfies both of his curiosity. He was so delighted with the product that sometimes he goes to bed with the globe lit.
customer_reviews.author: blutrane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Bought for our daughter. She loves it, and it’s been something the whole family can enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Too small  with some inaccurate information.
customer_reviews.text: The globe is really too small to read much of anything and the AR information has multiple mispronunciations ( River Thames in London). The concept is good and over time the product will hopefully improve
customer_reviews.author: barbara-jane paris

customer_reviews.title: Well made and the perfect size for my grandson's small room
customer_reviews.text: Well made and the perfect size for my grandson's small room. I, however, have some problem reading the small type. But he's 7, so it shouldn't be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Karlatta

customer_reviews.title: Nonsensical English & misinformation
customer_reviews.text: Going to try to send back ASAP. Absolute junk if you want your child to actually learn. Inaccurate information and very poor, nonsensical English in the descriptions of everything on the app 🙄 🤦🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Dunham

customer_reviews.title: I love this globe
customer_reviews.text: I love this globe! I was concerned about it being too small but it turned out to be a great size, can read it without problems and sits easily on my sons dresser. Absolutely love the constellation feature! Even better that they included a boiler to help find different constellations! Really excited to share the world and night sky with my kids
customer_reviews.author: Julie Denardis

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really like to read map and globe so we ordered this one she really likes it it has Led light which makes it easy to find and read the globe.
customer_reviews.author: rashmi v.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Not very bright at all. My children were very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Balusu

customer_reviews.title: AR App doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Still haven’t gotten the app to work with the globe. Should’ve sent this one back.
customer_reviews.author: PRobs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it! The print is very clear, even for the many tiny countries of our world. The colors are vibrant. The constellations are a great addition too. It’s become my son’s night light. I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer F.

customer_reviews.title: App wouldn't work
customer_reviews.text: The app would not work. Tried several times installing it. States not outlined.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H

customer_reviews.title: I like that it includes the constellations because this year my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my classroom so the students could see a map that is at least roughly proportional to real life. I like that it includes the constellations because this year my team and I did a couple of projects on the constellations and the mythology behind them. It looks really cool and will be a great addition to my classroom!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Marine

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this globe
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 5 year old son, and he loves it. He’s very interested in learning about other countries. This globe is great to show him where all the countries are, and the constellation part is a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for 9 year old.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this globe for 8 year for his birthday. He absolutely love it and learning about different countries and solar system. He uses as night light at night as well. This makes a great gift for any kids who are interested in geography.
customer_reviews.author: caleb

customer_reviews.title: Great Globe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my grandson. It was a big hit! The product was even better than I expected with the constellations showing in a dark room with the night light turned on. We all love it and I give it a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: AGS1717

customer_reviews.title: ... a quality globe for my 4 year old and LOVE the night-light constellations
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quality globe for my 4 year old and LOVE the night-light constellations. It's perfect for our needs. It seems like it will hold up over time, but it didn't break the bank. The night option isn't too bright at all (I was worried about that). Shipped quickly and was packed well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wetz

customer_reviews.title: Great little globe - as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Really nice globe, good size, illumination for the star formations very educational - great way for my 3 yr old to learn about where places are in the world and in the sky at night.. Solid base and very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: m s g kirk

customer_reviews.title: This is super cool and at night lights up to show the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for sun because he's really into looking at different countries. This is super cool and at night lights up to show the constellations. It's almost functions like a night light too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly like it was described. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jill M.

customer_reviews.title: Great educational gift, easy use for young children
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this globe as a gift for my 4-year-old. The globe is just the right size for a young child. The illustrations are age appropriate and the setup and use is easy for a young child.
customer_reviews.author: Mel V

customer_reviews.title: Good product. They love this
customer_reviews.text: I got this globe for my kids. Shipping was very smooth. And package was well protected. Good product. They love this. It also has constellation, so they can learn more. Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daigo Shibuki

customer_reviews.title: Great globe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, my son loves it. I found only a few places where the map is misaligned, but it doesn't affect reading the map. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria M.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Globe is cute. The app does not work AT ALL!!! No sound and after one information page it won’t read a new one. There is no customer service or tech support. Spend your money somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: georgia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Children
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this globe for our 6 year-old son, and he absolutely loves it. The light up constellation feature makes the globe even more exciting for a younger kid. The size is perfect, and the quality is great. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a 5yr old birthday present and it's a hit! Nice size and quality. Great product to begin to learn about maps, Earth and constellations. Also doubles as a cool nightlight.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 5 years old son really like this. Relatively small than expected, but in good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ji A.

customer_reviews.title: My boys age seven and four absolutely love this! They love to use it as a ...
customer_reviews.text: My boys age seven and four absolutely love this! They love to use it as a night light too. It’s a really cool product .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Learning Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my 7 year old boy. He loves discovering things from the world and using technology. Perfect for doing both while enjoying the fun with your kids! Totally recommend this product for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jose L.

customer_reviews.title: Great kids’ globe
customer_reviews.text: Fun way to teach kids about the world and constellation with the day/night settings. The light didn’t work at first but started working fine and has continued being turned on/off after wiggling the cord at first.
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: It’s a beautiful night light and globe
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful night light and globe, only problem is, the light only works when held upside down and a little to the side. The wires must not be connecting properly.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great globe!
customer_reviews.text: The globe arrived in good condition and everything works as advertised. My nine-year-old daughter (who loves constellations) actually said, "You know, this globe is a really thoughtful gift. Thanks!"
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Liudahl

customer_reviews.title: and the night time version when on turns into a great map of the solar system illuminated
customer_reviews.text: It is compact and small enough to sit on back corner of my desk. It is truly a world globe; and the night time version when on turns into a great map of the solar system illuminated. It is a beautiful night light.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Illuminated Globe
customer_reviews.text: The globe was a terrific birthday gift ! My 5 year old granddaughter loves it. Along with geography lessons she is eagerly learning about constellation each and every evening. The globe is much more attractive and functional than any other found at Barnes and Noble.
customer_reviews.author: Gray Ostermann

customer_reviews.title: good quality feels solid
customer_reviews.text: Shipped on time! Quality globe feels very nice touch. Not to mention the L.E.D. constellations look great at night. Cant beat the price good stuff

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We found that this was a great educational tool for homeschoolers. The fact that it's not just a globe, but it also allows the ability to view the stars and constellations is a great additional feature.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a child's curiosity.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 8 year old grandson and he lives it! He studies it every day and enjoys finding places in the world.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our toddler son to learn about the earth! Constellations are an added bonus!

product_meta.title: Smart Globe - Augmented Reality Educational World Geography, AR App Experience, Up to 10 Sections Educational Content, Realistic 3D Scenes, LED Light, STEM Toy Adventure Learning Toy Gift for Kids
feature_bullets: ☀☀ 【3 IN 1 Smart Globe】: This smart globe combines world map, LED night light and AR technology in one 9-inch globe. You can explore the world through this well-printed world globe. At night, press the ON/OFF button, the globe can be as a night light. With this App, you can enjoy an augmented reality experience in the Animals/Dinosaurs world, hopping from country to country, seeing famous landmarks. A fantastic adventure!

❤❤ 【AR Technology 10 themes in total for fun! 】: AR globe is the new early educational product for children based on AR (Augmented Reality) technology. With the world's leading globe surface identifying, tracking and 3D rendering technology, brings the globe to life with animals, dinosaurs, and famous landmarks, kids can have a direct and comprehensive picture of the whole world.

✈✈ 【CATEGORIES IN APP】: AR Globe by Vivabro is free on iOS and Android. Compatible with Apple IOS 8. 0 or above, Android 4. 4 or above. The AR Augmented Reality smart device app brings the globe to life with animals, dinosaurs, and famous landmarks.

❥❥ 【STEM Toy for Kids】 Compared to the traditional world globe, this smart globe does well in stimulating children's learning interest. Geography, Astronomy and encyclopedic knowledge can be acquired through this entertaining globe. Helps cultivate children's spatial imagination and creativity. APP takes the child on an Augmented Reality based journey around the world. Fun, interactive and educational!
❦ ❦ 【2 Year 】: Dipper globe is a professional brand focusing on the globe innovation and manufacture for 18 years. We can offer replacement if the globe has any problems.
